FOLD.name: GREEN
FOLD.title: Alfresco Preview environment for Off5th and LAT

XHEADER.Title: sd1palf01lx alfresco instance will be brought down

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
#!/bin/bash ################################################################################# # The script acts as a wrapper script to stop alfresco and clear out Solr indexes. # for Saks Preview Environments. # Developed By: Chinmay Bhatawdekar #################################################################################
ssh alfresco@sd1palf01lx.saksdirect.com "/home/alfresco/green/apache-tomcat-7.0.42/alfresco.sh stop"

XHEADER.Title: sd1palf01lx alfresco instance solr Indexes will be cleared

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
#!/bin/bash ################################################################################# # The script acts as a wrapper script to clear out Solr indexes on Alfresco # for Saks Preview Environments. # Developed By: Chinmay Bhatawdekar #################################################################################
ssh alfresco@sd1palf01lx.saksdirect.com "/home/alfresco/green/clearSolrIndex.sh"

XHEADER.Title: sd1palf01lx alfresco instance will be brought UP

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
#!/bin/bash ################################################################################# # The script acts as a wrapper script to start alfresco and clear out Solr indexes. # for O5A and LAT Preview Environments. # Developed By: Chinmay Bhatawdekar #################################################################################
FILEPATH="/home/alfresco/green/apache-tomcat-7.0.42/alfresco.pid" ssh alfresco@sd1palf01lx.saksdirect.com "test -e $FILEPATH" if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then PIDNO=`ssh alfresco@sd1palf01lx.saksdirect.com "cat $FILEPATH"` ssh alfresco@sd1palf01lx.saksdirect.com "ps -ef | grep $PIDNO | grep -v grep" if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "Server Failed to shutdown, Forcing server shutdown" ssh alfresco@sd1palf01lx.saksdirect.com "kill -9 $PIDNO" fi ssh alfresco@sd1palf01lx.saksdirect.com "rm $FILEPATH" fi sleep 60 ssh alfresco@sd1palf01lx.saksdirect.com "/home/alfresco/green/apache-tomcat-7.0.42/alfresco.sh start"

XHEADER.Title: sd1malf01lx alfresco instance will be brought down

SCRIPT.MSCRI:

ssh alfresco@sd1malf01lx.saksdirect.com "/home/alfresco/preview/apache-tomcat-7.0.42/alfresco.sh stop"
